data.content:
Rejection Reason: There is no agent history view lmfao.  not sure why this was marked for verification
Handoff capsule (2026-02-20):\n- Implemented in commit 5af0eb8 and pushed to origin/main.\n- Direct orchestration prompt no longer embeds full bead/dependency JSON; it now uses objective + explicit in-scope IDs (if present) and instructs agent to query bd for context.\n- Removed per-bead dependency fan-out () during session start to reduce startup latency.\n- Direct UI now surfaces explicit waiting feedback: status text + console/diagram badges show 'Waiting on agent...' until real agent output arrives.\n- Verification: bun run test (pass), bun run build (pass), bun run lint (pass with pre-existing warnings in bead-form.tsx and verification-orchestrator.ts).
Handoff capsule (clean, 2026-02-20):
- Implemented in commit 5af0eb8 and pushed to origin/main.
- Direct orchestration prompt no longer includes full repository bead/dependency JSON. It now uses the core instructions, objective, and explicit in-scope bead IDs when available.
- Startup no longer fans out dependency lookups across every bead before launching the agent.
- Direct UI now shows Waiting on agent status/badges while no real agent output has arrived.
- Verification completed: bun run test passed, bun run build passed, bun run lint passed with pre-existing warnings unrelated to this change.
Handoff capsule (2026-02-20, commit 09a79ad):
- Added new History view tab and pane for implementation-focused agent interactions (Take!/Scene only).
- Left pane lists beats with Take!/Scene logs sorted by most recently worked.
- Right pane shows chronological appâ†”agent logs (session start/end, prompts, responses) with prompt-source labels.
- Added /api/agent-history plus log parsing for .jsonl/.jsonl.gz histories.
- Updated terminal prompt logging to capture follow-up/auto prompts, not just initial prompts.
- Verification: bun run test (pass), bun run lint (pass with pre-existing warnings in bead-form.tsx and verification-orchestrator.ts), bun run build (pass).
Handoff capsule (2026-02-20, commit b3c2c55):
- Reduced typography scale across Agent History view.
- Top row now 50/50: left title selector and right beat-details panel with matched fixed height.
- Left selector shows 5 titles at a time with scrolling and explicit Last updated metadata.
- Right details panel is scrollable and includes beat metadata/description/acceptance/notes.
- History feed moved below top row and styled as a dark terminal-like console with App -> Agent / Agent -> App direction labels.
- Agent history API now supports sinceHours; view requests last 24h and filters to recent beats.
- Verification: bun run test (pass), bun run lint (pass with pre-existing warnings in bead-form.tsx and verification-orchestrator.ts), bun run build (pass).
